description:
when i use nova-volume to start the service the service working, but when i use service openstack-nova-volume start, there is error like below:



2012-07-30 16:52:51 CRITICAL nova [-] Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo nova-rootwrap vgs --noheadings -o name
Exit code: 1
Stdout: ''
Stderr: 'sudo: sorry, you must have a tty to run sudo\n'
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-volume", line 49, in <module>
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     service.wait()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 413, in wait
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     _launcher.wait()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 131, in wait
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     service.wait()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 166, in wait
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     return self._exit_event.wait()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/event.py", line 116, in wait
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     return hubs.get_hub().switch()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/hubs/hub.py", line 177, in switch
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     return self.greenlet.switch()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 192, in main
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     result = function(*args, **kwargs)
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 101, in run_server
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     server.start()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 162, in start
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     self.manager.init_host()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/volume/manager.py", line 93, in init_host
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     self.driver.check_for_setup_error()
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/volume/driver.py", line 103, in check_for_setup_error
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     run_as_root=True)
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/utils.py", line 243, in execute
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     cmd=' '.join(cmd))
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova ProcessExecutionError: Unexpected error while running command.
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Command: sudo nova-rootwrap vgs --noheadings -o name
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Exit code: 1
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Stdout: ''
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Stderr: 'sudo: sorry, you must have a tty to run sudo\n'
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova


the other when i run command nova-network to start network service, this work correctly, but when i use service openstack-nova-network start, this has faults like below:


2012-07-30 17:01:40 CRITICAL nova [-] failed to create /var/lock/nova/stack01-163c050-163c050.28732
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-network", line 49, in <module>
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     service.wait()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 413, in wait
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     _launcher.wait()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 131, in wait
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     service.wait()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 166, in wait
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     return self._exit_event.wait()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/event.py", line 116, in wait
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     return hubs.get_hub().switch()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/hubs/hub.py", line 177, in switch
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     return self.greenlet.switch()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 192, in main
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     result = function(*args, **kwargs)
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 101, in run_server
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     server.start()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 162, in start
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     self.manager.init_host()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/quantum/manager.py", line 90, in init_host
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     self.l3driver.initialize()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/l3.py", line 84, in initialize
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     linux_net.init_host()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/linux_net.py", line 442, in init_host
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     add_snat_rule(ip_range)
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/network/linux_net.py", line 432, in add_snat_rule
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     iptables_manager.apply()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/utils.py", line 940, in inner
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     with lock:
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lockfile.py", line 223, in __enter__
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     self.acquire()
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lockfile.py", line 239, in acquire
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova     raise LockFailed("failed to create %s" % self.unique_name)
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova LockFailed: failed to create /var/lock/nova/stack01-163c050-163c050.28732
2012-07-30 17:01:40 TRACE nova
title: On Centos6.0, use RPM install openstack essex ,

comments.content:
when i use nova-volume to start the service the service working, but when i use service openstack-nova-volume start, there is error like below:



2012-07-30 16:52:51 CRITICAL nova [-] Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo nova-rootwrap vgs --noheadings -o name
Exit code: 1
Stdout: ''
Stderr: 'sudo: sorry, you must have a tty to run sudo\n'

2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eventlet/greenthread.py", line 192, in main
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     result = function(*args, **kwargs)
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 101, in run_server
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     server.start()

2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova     self.manager.init_host()

2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Stdout: ''
2012-07-30 16:52:51 TRACE nova Stderr: 'sudo: sorry, you must have a tty to run sudo\n'

the other when i run command nova-network to start network service, this work correctly, but when i use service openstack-nova-network start, this has faults like below:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~changchun-1128

comments.content:
Where did you get the RPMs?  Is there any reasons you can't use 6.2 or 6.3?

This is most likely not a bug in nova.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: @Hi Russell, I install epel source , and yum search openstack get all the RPMs list and install the RPMS. is there any error？
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~changchun-1128

comments.content:
Hi Carrez,

   sorry for not concerning the topic. i had  fixed it.  this problem is
that  i did not add the sudo  file(etc/sudoers.d/nova) to sudo(/etc/sudo).

thanks
changchun
